showerReviews.reviewText: … Ahhh!! ... Pool for the lessons is warm and used for the parties as well! Plenty of places for kids to shower and dress afterward! …

… with the staff and the facility. If you’re looking for a clean facility with comfortable shower and changing rooms, indoor and outdoor pools and multiple lap options for competitive strength training and growth then SWAC is for you!

… a 25yd option and a 50m option. Very clean, excellent aeration -- pool temp was cool despite 100 degree heat outside. Shower and changing stalls are utilitarian but serves their purpose. Amazingly affordable. I will definitely come back. …
